lead_paragraph: The season stands out for what it engendered: vastly improved safety in Formula One and the making of Ayrton Senna's tragic legend.

headline.main: 1994, a Year of Danger and Intrigue
headline.print_headline: 1994, a Year of Danger and Intrigue
